*[Bug 16003] heatmap scale argument: description not complete*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=16003>

--- Comment #5 from Tomek Gieorgijewski (<mailto:cybergeorge2020@gmail.com|cybergeorge2020@gmail.com>) ---
Created attachment 3383
  --> <https://bugs.r-project.org/attachment.cgi?id=3383&action=edit>
Patch 2 with new examples. Includes the previous one.

I added two examples as you requested.

I wanted to show that if you switch columns with rows in input matrix, you need
separately also change `scale` parameter if you'd like to sustain the visual
effect in histogram.
I hope it show independence from dendogram.

Unfortunately, even after studying .Rd format documentation, it's not obvious
to me if it's possible to have link to other part/section in the same .Rd
document.
So I didn't do it.

If you could tell me how, I would gladly add such link to the patch.
